name: Pizzabot
description:
In this game you will play as a little rebel robot, Rad. His job is to deliver lots of pizzas acoross the city, with the help of his goat-cycle. In the way, you will make friends and explore this crazy world.

Controls:

Left - A / Joystck Left 

Right - D / Joystck Right 

Normal Jump - W / Joystck Up

Jetpack - SPACE / A

Charge shot - LEFT MOUSE / LT

Shoot - Release LEFT MOUSE / Release LT

Sprint - SHIFT/ RB

Zoom in/out - Z / D-PAD

During the levels you have to go door-to-door delivering the pizzas, and in some cases, just shoot it through the window. When you are done with the deliverys, just return to the goat-cycle.

Pizzabot is a project I made a while ago, in 2018. It looks very rusty, and it's my first big project, it took me 2 years to complete it. I hope you like playing it as much as I did making it.
